name: gae-node-hello-world
description: Hello World Node App for Google App Engine

scripts.docker:stop: docker kill $(docker ps -f ancestor=$PROJECT_ID/image:$REVISION_ID -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -a -f status=exited -q) && docker rmi $PROJECT_ID/image:$REVISION_ID
scripts.docker:test: docker build -t $PROJECT_ID/image/test:$REVISION_ID -f Dockerfile.test . && docker run --rm $PROJECT_ID/image/test:$REVISION_ID && docker rmi $PROJECT_ID/image/test:$REVISION_ID

author: Gautam Arora
